title: ABC to TAB
description: A planning system to translate music written in ABC notation into guitar TAB notation. It combines the abc2abc parser, Fast-Downward Planning system, and the abctab2ps program.

title: Improving Models for Health-Related Social Media Text Classification
description: Used a NLP model for text classification of health data retrieved from social media. The previous highest published F1 score for this task with the same dataset was 64.9. We were able consistently achieve a score above 95 using our method.

title: Portfolio Website for Opal Events & Arrangements
description: Designed and created a portfolio website for Opal Events & Arrangements. Implemented system for easy website modification so that the website can grow with the company.

title: Personal Website
description: Personal website to present my skills, interests, accomplishments, and projects. The website you are on currently.
